review.title: “This is an opportunity”
review.pros: Pros – Great learning opportunity for beginner. Good communication within the company.still in growing business. still hire employee for potential growth.
review.cons: Cons – Hierarchy within the company.Long working hours. High stress. Lack of support from senior team. not so good benefit package.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give the opportunity for employee to grow within the company.need to empower the employee and create positive working atmosphere.
